short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate your dropshipping store administration including inventory management and order fulfillment.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Anstrex Dropship platform offers incredible product research and store management tools to dropshippers. The platform gives phenomenal insights on finding the hot-selling product on supplier sites such as AliExpress. 

Our platform has millions of products that you can add to your store and start selling on your store with a few mouse clicks. There is no need to worry about stocking, packaging or shipping any products. All you need to do is populate your store with bestselling products using our amazing tools and promote them using various online marketing channels. Watch your sales skyrocket and profit climb!

This chrome extension works in conjunction with our web application and performs following tasks:

- Import items to your dropshipping store directly from suppliers such as AliExpress with minimal effort 
- Help you with managing your daily product inventory and keeping it synced with your supplier
- Automate product fulfillment by ordering the product from AliExpress with just a few mouse clicks. Entire checkout process is 100% automated!
- Keep track of all the orders placed with supplier and automatically update the status

To learn more about our dropship product, please visit https://www.anstrex.com/product/dropship

*Please note that this is a beta release of the extension.
